releases.body:
- Feature: Alt-clicking on a link or "Save asâ€¦" context menu item will download an image or link immediately
- Feature: Copy image context menu
- Feature: (macOS) Don't quit the app when closing the window #56
- Fix: (Linux) Don't show broken and unsupported "Set as Default IRC client" dialog
- Fix: (Linux) Working AppImage package #55

- Feature: Prompt to set as default IRC client
- Feature: Remember window position #48 
- Feature: Added a menu option to disable spellcheck while typing #47 
- Feature: (Linux) Now available in [AppImage](http://appimage.org/) format
- Fix: Make sure streamlined login page is still used after logging out, or session invalidation
- Fix: (macOS) Remove icon from DMG #43

- Fix Windows build
- Fix error on window resize in Windows (#42)

- Fixes icon on Linux (#34)
- Save maximised state (#39)
- Added an option to enabled menu bar autohiding on Windows and Linux (#37)
- Added page zoom (#20)
- Automatic updates (#8)
- Windows builds are now code signed.

_NOTE_ Windows build was broken, the binaries have been removed.

releases.name: v0.1.7
releases.body:
- Update electron to v0.37.8
- Mac: 3-finger swipe forward/back navigation
- Improved, simpler login screen
- Windows/Linux: Added a tray icon option
- Context menu item to open links in browser
- Middle click, or hold Cmd (Mac) or Ctrl (Win/Linux) while clicking links to open them in the background
- Fix non-clickable menu items

- Small spellcheck tweaks
- Update Electron to 0.37
- Now built for Linux as well (currently untested)
- Mac builds are now code-signed
- 32-bit Windows builds are gone. I don't know why, presumably because we updated electron-builder. They might come back, if people need them.

- Right/ctrl click context menu for copying and navigation
- Fix file/app/window menus
- Change Github link to point to Known Issues

- Support forward/back mouse buttons on Windows
- Remove inert About menu option

- Exceedingly provisional Windows builds
- Menu updates, forward/back shortcuts.

- Display mixed-content user images
- Input box context menus
- Spellchecking support
